content: The Agate Jar is one of the Curios items you can find throughout Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the strongest early-game Curios' thanks to its effect.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Agate_Jar.md', within the main section titled 'Agate Jar'.
The content is as follows:
The Agate Jar is one of the Curios items you can find throughout Black Myth: Wukong. It is one of the strongest early-game Curios' thanks to its effect.
